title: Ngai teh Kalvari tlang kraws chungah
lyrics:
Ngai teh, Kalvari tlang kraws chungah, 
Mi tin tan nunna tui a luang a; 
A ring a piang chu an nung ang a, 
Ring la, i nung ang.

Ring la, i nung ang, 
Kraws chungah nunna tui hlu a luang, 
Ring la, i nung ang.

I sual zawng zawng a tleng fai zo ta, 
Chhandamna hmun i thleng thei dawn tawh a; 
Isuan nunna kawng min hawnsak ta, 
Ring la, i nung ang.

Nunna tui bua a luang fim leh ta, 
Tlantu fak tlak kan tan a nung a; 
Ropui takin a eng chhuak leh ta, 
Ring la, i nung ang.

Tlantu nung chuan min hruai chhuak leh ta, 
Thim leh sual zinga kan awm tawh kha; 
Vanram thianghlim min thlenpui ang a, 
Ring la, i nung ang.
